explains: n. 杀害，谋杀（尤用于报纸上）
v. 杀害（slay 的现在分词）

sentences.en: Gan Ning's 100 crossed the camp at full tilt, slaying anyone they encountered.
sentences.cn: 那甘宁百骑，在营内纵横驰骤，逢着便杀。

sentences.en: Thus God rendered the wickedness of Abimelech, which he did unto his father, in slaying his seventy brethren.
sentences.cn: 这样，神报应亚比·米勒向他父亲所行的恶，就是杀了弟兄七十个人的恶。

sentences.en: And then comes whaling and dolphin-slaying, where the cultural gap with much of the Western world appears at its widest.
sentences.cn: 然后就是对鲸鱼和海豚的捕杀，在这点上，日本与西方世界的文化差异从未如此之大。
